MINI CLUBMAN

MINI CLUBMAN

MINI COUNTRYMAN

MINI COUNTRYMAN
John Cooper Works
Offers

We're going electric.
who's in?

It's the next chapter of MINI Electric journey - this September, we'll be revealing the MINI Electric Concept. We're going electric. But we're not changing. We're keeping everything you know and love about MINI - from legendary go-kart handling to iconic design - and we're adding electricity.
LEARN MORE

John Cooper Works.
A LEGEND IS BORN.

Around 50 years ago, the course of history was changed forever. Mini suddenly burst onto the motorsport rally scene, annihilating the much bigger and established competition – much to their shock. Legendary racing car pioneer, John Cooper had taken his hand to the iconic little car and transformed it into a champion. It was the beginning of a highly successful partnership between Mini and John Cooper. One whose legacy lives on to this day in MINI John Cooper Works.

More

MINI ORIGINAL WHEELS AND TYRES WITH STAR MARKING.

Our stylish MINI Original Wheels and Tyres are engineered and tested to ensure your MINI's best performance and grip. So you won't just stand out from the rest – but stay safe on all terrain in all temperatures.

Explore Wheels and Tyres

JOHN COOPER WORKS.
MINI THRILL MAXIMISED.

John Cooper Works is all about extreme driving and fun at the highest level of precision. But the highest performance demands tight control and stability, especially when you’re driving through bends at higher speeds. So we specially designed the 18” and 19” light alloy wheels to accommodate high-performance brakes. In bold Chili Red with a John Cooper Works badge, the 4-piston, fixed-caliper brakes provide you with all the stopping power you need for tight turns and fast changes of pace.
CONFIGURE
Some modifications have been made to the MINI product range due to the current situation. These might affect models, engines and special equipment. Some items may also be subject to limited availability and longer delivery times. For further information, please contact your MINI partner.

John Cooper Works
Offers

We're going electric.
who's in?

It's the next chapter of MINI Electric journey - this September, we'll be revealing the MINI Electric Concept. We're going electric. But we're not changing. We're keeping everything you know and love about MINI - from legendary go-kart handling to iconic design - and we're adding electricity.
LEARN MORE

John Cooper Works.
A LEGEND IS BORN.

Around 50 years ago, the course of history was changed forever. Mini suddenly burst onto the motorsport rally scene, annihilating the much bigger and established competition – much to their shock. Legendary racing car pioneer, John Cooper had taken his hand to the iconic little car and transformed it into a champion. It was the beginning of a highly successful partnership between Mini and John Cooper. One whose legacy lives on to this day in MINI John Cooper Works.

More

MINI ORIGINAL WHEELS AND TYRES WITH STAR MARKING.

Our stylish MINI Original Wheels and Tyres are engineered and tested to ensure your MINI's best performance and grip. So you won't just stand out from the rest – but stay safe on all terrain in all temperatures.

Explore Wheels and Tyres

JOHN COOPER WORKS.
MINI THRILL MAXIMISED.

John Cooper Works is all about extreme driving and fun at the highest level of precision. But the highest performance demands tight control and stability, especially when you’re driving through bends at higher speeds. So we specially designed the 18” and 19” light alloy wheels to accommodate high-performance brakes. In bold Chili Red with a John Cooper Works badge, the 4-piston, fixed-caliper brakes provide you with all the stopping power you need for tight turns and fast changes of pace.
CONFIGURE
Some modifications have been made to the MINI product range due to the current situation. These might affect models, engines and special equipment. Some items may also be subject to limited availability and longer delivery times. For further information, please contact your MINI partner.
